titleStmt.title: By the King: a declaration. James R. Our will and pleasure is, that all field officers, captains, lieutenants, and other inferior officers of our army now absent from their respective commands, do notwithstanding any former license, repair forthwith to their said commands, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for alderman James Malone printer to the King's most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold at his shop in Skinnerrow, and by Andrew Crook on Ormond-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and opening lines of text.
"Given at our court at Dublin-Castle the 19th day of March 1689."
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
